name: WooCommerce One Click Upsell Funnel Pro
author: WP Swings

sections.description:
Show exclusive post-checkout offers to your customers. Create dedicated Upsell offer pages. Offers that are relevant and benefits your customers on the existing purchase and so increase Average Order Value and your Revenue.

Visit plugin site →
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements
  • WordPress 4.4 or greater
  • Woocommerce 3.0 or greater
  • PHP version 5.4 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater

Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of Extension, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.
Then click Upload Plugin from the browse button you can choose the woocommerce-one-click-upsell-funnel-pro.zip file and press ok, you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.


Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading our extension and uploading it to your webserver via your favourite FTP application.

Version 3.0.0

Version 2.0.0

sections.update_notice:
WooCommerce One Click Upsell Funnel Pro v3.6.9 update notice :

  • Other: Upsell offer product qunatity issue.
  • Other: Migrator issue.
  • Other: Upsell-Behavioral Analytics issue.
  • New: Minor Bug fixes and optimisation.
  • New: Compatible with latest WP and WC.

Heads up, Please migrate after upgrade!

The latest update includes some substantial changes across different areas of the plugin. We highly recommend you to migrate current settings and funnels after your site before upgrading, and make sure you first update in a staging environment
